Name: Savannah
Ingredients: 15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Gin and orange with a hint of chocolate - smoothed with egg white.
History: A pre- Prohibition cocktail that first appears in Albert Stevens Crockett's 1931 book Old Waldorf Bar Days .
Nutrition: One serving of Savannah contains 196 calories
